texts.name: Palencia
texts.biography: Palencia turned fanatic after the disaster, even if she is just a cleric apprentice before. She had seen her classmates are all dead in this disaster, so she decided to fight for herself. Now she became a high priest for the church.

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Sextons and Cantors by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 5 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Sextons
